Name: Dream of Sakura and Sea Ganoderma
Desc: A strange plant growing in the Veluriyam Mirage, it appears as light as a balloon and to be nearly floating. In the eyes of visitors from Inazuma, the color looks like a dessert made from Sakura Blooms and Sea Ganoderma that should have the most excellent and elastic texture. Actually, the petals of this plant can be used to make balls for entertainment, and according to legend, the Hydro Eidolons use them to play some simple ball sports. Unfortunately, no guests have yet witnessed such antics...
